ðŸ“– Summary: FreeCut is a powerful, open-source video editor that runs entirely within your web browser. It offers professional-grade features like multi-track editing, keyframe animation, and real-time preview, all without requiring any installation or server-side processing, leveraging modern web APIs for local editing.
